salaryExpectations: LKR 50,000 (Technician) to LKR 200,000+ (Technical Supervisor/Workshop Owner) per month.
futureOutlook: Skilled technicians are the lifeblood of every industry. There is a massive shortage of qualified and reliable technicians in Sri Lanka, creating huge demand. Those with NVQ qualifications and specializations (e.g., in industrial automation, hybrid vehicles) have excellent earning potential. Many experienced technicians go on to run their own successful businesses.
